items.sentence: Tom says he\'s thinking about getting a dog.
Tom didn\'t have to answer Mary\'s question.
Tom doesn\'t know where Mary\'s umbrella is.
Tom wouldn\'t go off and leave us, would he?
I\'ll do whatever it takes to make it right.
I\'ll do whatever it takes to reach the top.
I\'ll give it back next Monday without fail.
I\'ll give you this notebook if you want it.
You\'re not a very good negotiator, are you?
You\'re not going to let Tom drive, are you?
I don\'t expect that to happen anytime soon.
I suspect Tom has to go to Boston next week.
Tom convinced Mary to go to Boston with him.
Tom cooked the steak just the way I like it.
Tom cooks a lot better than you might think.
Tom could be planning to do that by himself.
When\'s the last time you hung out with Tom?
When\'s the last time you rode a motorcycle?
I can\'t play the guitar as well as you can.
I can\'t remember who I lent my umbrella to.
